AdditionalDetails.description: A field where selling party can provide additional information for tax related or any other purposes.

detail.description: The detail of the additional information provided by the selling party.

languageCode.description: The language code of the additional information detail.

type.description: The type of the additional information provided by the selling party.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: An additional tax on something already taxed, such as a higher rate of tax on incomes above a certain level.
OCR.

addressLine2.description: Additional street address information, if required.

addressLine3.description: Additional street address information, if required.

city.description: The city where the person, business or institution is located.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

county.description: The county where person, business or institution is located.

district.description: The district where person, business or institution is located.

name.description: The name of the person, business or institution at that address.

phone.description: The phone number of the person, business or institution located at that address.

postalCode.description: The postal code of that address. It conatins a series of letters or digits or both, sometimes including spaces or punctuation.

stateOrRegion.description: The state or region where person, business or institution is located.

ChargeDetails.description: Monetary and tax details of the charge.

taxDetails.description: Individual tax details per line item.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Additional charge applied for giftwrap order.
Fulfillment fees are the costs associated with receiving and storing products along with processing orders from handling to shipping.
Charge to insert ads on orders.
Additional charge for packaging orders.
Additional charge for loading orders.
Freight-out refers to the costs for which the seller is responsible when shipping to a buyer, such as delivery and insurance expenses.
Tax collected at source (TCS) is the tax payable by a seller which he collects from the buyer at the time of sale.

Decimal.description:
A decimal number with no loss of precision. Useful when precision loss is unacceptable, as with currencies. Follows RFC7159 for number representation.
**Pattern** : `^-?(0|([1-9]\d*))(\.\d+)?([eE][+-]?\d+)?$`.

Error.description: Error response returned when the request is unsuccessful.

code.description: An error code that identifies the type of error that occurred.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or fix the issue.

message.description: A message that describes the error condition.

ErrorList.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

additionalDetails.description: Additional details provided by the selling party, for tax related or other purposes.

chargeDetails.description: Total charge amount details for all line items.

items.description: Provides the details of the items in this invoice.

paymentTermsCode.description: The payment terms for the invoice.

referenceNumber.description: An additional unique reference number used for regulatory or other purposes.

taxTotals.description: Individual tax details per line item.

buyerProductIdentifier.description: Buyer's standard identification number (ASIN) of an item.

chargeDetails.description: Individual charge details per line item.

hsnCode.description: HSN tax code. The HSN number cannot contain alphabets.

itemSequenceNumber.description: Numbering of the item on the purchase order. The first item will be 1, the second 2, and so on.

purchaseOrderNumber.description: The purchase order number for this order. Formatting Notes: 8-character alpha-numeric code.

taxDetails.description: Individual tax details per line item.

vendorOrderNumber.description: The vendor's order number for this order.

vendorProductIdentifier.description: The vendor selected product identification of the item.

amount.description: Quantity of units available for a specific item.

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the available quantity.

Money.description: An amount of money, including units in the form of currency.

currencyCode.description: Three digit currency code in ISO 4217 format.

taxRegistrationDetails.description: Tax registration details of the entity.

SubmitInvoiceRequest.description: The request schema for the submitInvoice operation.

SubmitInvoiceResponse.description: The response schema for the submitInvoice operation.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Central Goods and Services Tax (CGST) is levied by the Indian government for intrastate movement of goods and services.
State Goods and Services Tax (SGST) is an indirect tax levied and collected by a State Government in India on the intra-state supplies.
A cess is a form of tax levied by the government on tax with specific purposes till the time the government gets enough money for that purpose.
Union Territory Goods and Services Tax in India.
Integrated Goods and Services Tax (IGST) is a tax levied on all Inter-State supplies of goods and/or services in India.
Mehrwertsteuer, MwSt, is the German for value-added tax.
A provincial sales tax (PST) is imposed on consumers of goods and particular services in many Canadian provinces.
Taxe sur la Valeur Ajoutée (TVA) is French for Value-added tax.
Value-added tax.
Tax levied on most goods and services sold for domestic consumption.
Sales tax.
Tax levied on consumption spending on goods and services.
Tax component that was mutually agreed upon between Amazon and vendor.
Domestic Value-added tax.

TaxRegistrationDetail.description: Tax registration details of the entity.

taxRegistrationMessage.description: Tax registration message that can be used for additional tax related details.

taxRegistrationNumber.description: Tax registration number for the party. For example, VAT ID.

taxRegistrationType.description: Tax registration type for the entity.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Value-added tax.
Goods and Services tax.

transactionId.description: GUID to identify this transaction. This value can be used with the Transaction Status API to return the status of this transaction.

info.description: The Selling Partner API for Direct Fulfillment Payments provides programmatic access to a direct fulfillment vendor's invoice data.
info.title: Selling Partner API for Direct Fulfillment Payments

post.description:
Submits one or more invoices for a vendor's direct fulfillment orders.

**Usage Plans:**

| Plan type | Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- | ---- |
|Default| 10 | 10 |
|Selling partner specific| Variable | Variable |

The x-amzn-RateLimit-Limit response header returns the usage plan rate limits that were applied to the requested operation. Rate limits for some selling partners will vary from the default rate and burst shown in the table above. For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

400.description: Request has missing or invalid parameters and cannot be parsed.

errors.message: The value '2020-03.13' of element 'invoiceDate' is not valid.
The content of element 'invoice' is not complete. One of '{invoiceNumber, referenceNumber}' is expected.
'2020-03.13' is not a valid value for 'dateTime'.

403.description: Indicates that access to the resource is forbidden. Possible reasons include Access Denied, Unauthorized, Expired Token, or Invalid Signature.

404.description: The resource specified does not exist.

413.description: The request size exceeded the maximum accepted size.

415.description: The request payload is in an unsupported format.

429.description: The frequency of requests was greater than allowed.

500.description: An unexpected condition occurred that prevented the server from fulfilling the request.

503.description: Temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.
